section.p: This section contains the reason(s) for the procedure or surgery. This section may include the preprocedure diagnoses as well as symptoms contributing to the reason for the procedure.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-8058, CONF:1098-10445, CONF:1098-32572 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.29"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Procedure Indications Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.29)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15419)/@code="59768-2" Procedure Indications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15420, CONF:1098-30827)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-8743, CONF:1098-15508)
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Procedure Indications Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.29)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15419)/@code="59768-2" Procedure Indications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15420, CONF:1098-30827)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8060, R2.0=CONF:1098-8060)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8061, R2.0=CONF:1098-8061)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-8743, CONF:1098-15508)
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.29" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.29"/> <code code="59768-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Procedure Indications"/> <title>Procedure Indications</title> <text>RhGSeo xvFBa rAbuxECK bxHRF tEHehZ NqyVsV wKJqir FoOucoZ sZSClATTs CicEVID RXEZXGR RraphHlC QqpIhv hoEPCt gGPCSew JFxobxkA DldCio umKEwlI bbXsZ NOtojVK jRGLZ Ucdri zOVdRDqN OuiIldjZ WEEju scFTGBpn mUKARGk MWdtEPN zbqbIxqIy uRRcIYCgG qDdkEd BTVOb lFnzCzw dVJVif mimaip IaaINNf seezfoR lxAWvFyhT fdsBmb tLzgHzbs uDhvbl WpzApEcIs PbbFgWiIJ KSIMueOVP TYHaX fdoGkQ fDfxLEo wzWetDcPc aSYvmhOy pMTxSFaV tKuseP QzsWinIeo CfQFAfV ozmSZK CbWVzB YqzuiL OvuOuxB FSMaDc ojypiUq aeniGAqv CHFQeptI XovAs itarrGJeM mHtEL WsdTVVwrW MSvGyS gDKDiwryc UMkMLwB SoEeFCdh PLGKHXTc CZvWjMCTL DhWok WEQqjdD wrdVNrNlt lSQYdDG CnFMmSyus GSMZs MkoQPDKqy bOoNka zbyzIz BylXPnJlL zHygeWubd gLXLgtN lMjqtX yqwfOvKi igQIwJ NQCRPPG jjPcMJ wQWZR zhkSixjn FfemvPTXw VMUlPbonj nzXXf erRCkJd FaxFYeIl ZFUyjRcw eFEXH cjwxImgL CvzsGUN YkTwAX tWRhSdAt QDVzmQHYP JRUQY eiVetjg OWVPRQX NLMxQpyQZ jarbK BJELu rtsKuYxJ fdbaDS gLjfIjZRb vbgYlA qUTlkZd opVfck fhyMBo LWDkzDYWx VigjFp DWBrkS VUXDHKKhT HaUwE akTCcTmeW KjlgvB EgZgWA uSIEtav cgPNwJUyX CTEDwWlE OxhoU sRldRR maiDPz wshPXgHu DzIJm SrdDk sWiTi tMUjqMJI </text> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entry> </section>
